messages.title: TIME FOR A CHANGE
messages.content: We've been let down by a succession of governments for too long.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP recognizes the benefits of limited, controlled immigration. Proposes an Australian type points system to fill skill gaps in the UK job market; requirements for those coming to work in the UK, including having a job, speaking English, having accommodation agreed prior to arrival; no amnesty on illegal immigration; health insurance for entry for five years; tax and NI contributions for five years before claiming UK benefits.

issues.brexitEurope: It is time we left the EU and took back control of our borders.
issues.immigration: UNLIMITED IMMIGRATION MEANS British jobs being offered to Non British workers; Millions in taxpayers money for housing benefit and other welfare payments; Building 1000 new homes every week for 20 years; Huge new workload for doctors and teachers.

housing.content: Millions in taxpayers money for housing benefit and other welfare payments; Building 1000 new homes every week for 20 years.
